attributes.action: Revoke the neo-fascist Police, Crime, Sentencing and Courts Bill.
attributes.additional_details:
This is dystopian, draconian and neo-fascist.
It is an insult to our democracy.
We the undersigned demand it is withdrawn.
attributes.background: The Police, Crime, Sentencing and Courts Bill will minimise the legal rights of members of the public to protest, especially near Parliament or if the protest is non-violent but a "nuisance". It also sets out the framework for harsher punishments for vandalising a statue than for rape.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not pass the Police, Crime, Sentencing and Courts Bill: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579242

Do not restrict our rights to peaceful protest: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579012

Remove single person protest clauses in Police, Crime, Sentencing & Courts Bill: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578875
